feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Classic Theme Explorer Lite 1.1.2
entry.content: Add additional check to the ClientEdge adder at suggestion of @aubymori

entry.title: Play-Media-Key fix in Explorer 1.1
entry.content: Simplify initialization to prevent the explorer process hanging

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Improved jump list size and position handling.
  • Adjusted the 1px taskbar border to be at the bottom of the taskbar.
  • Fixed the start menu disappearing or being positioned incorrectly sometimes.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.2.5
entry.content:
• Improved tray overflow position, now it's vertically centered to the mouse position and isn't shown far away from the taskbar.
  • Fixed right click menu location for some tray icons.
  • Fixed jump list width on high DPIs.

entry.title: Taskbar Background Helper 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Added an optional configuration for dark mode.
  • Improved maximized window detection.

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar on top for Windows 11

Moves the Windows 11 taskbar to the top of the screen.

Compatibility

The mod was designed for up-to-date Windows 11 versions 22H2 to 24H2. Other versions weren't tested and are probably not compatible.

entry.title: Windows 11 Notification Center Styler 1.1.3
entry.content: • Added support for the action center (Win+A) in Windows 11 version 24H2.

entry.title: Accent Color Sync 1.41
entry.content:
• Hotfix to account for new OpenGlass registry values as announced in the latest update.
  • Updated readme.

entry.title: Slick Window Arrangement 1.0.2
entry.content:
• Fixed snapping frame being stuck in some cases.
  • Fixed windows jumping to the top left corner of the screen while moving in some cases.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.2.4
entry.content:
• Fixed a single pixel of the background not aligning with maximized windows.
  • Fixed notifications being moved to the top of the screen.

entry.title: Start button always on the left 1.1.1
entry.content:
• Fixed taskbar buttons not being completely centered.
  • Fixed restoring styles on unload.

entry.title: StartIsBack++ Tweaker 0.7.1
entry.content: • Fixed a restart loop fix

entry.title: Taskbar Labels for Windows 11 1.3.1
entry.content:
• Improved badge placement (e.g. unread counters) in some cases.
  • Fixed the "Centered, fixed size" indicator not being always centered.

entry.title: Taskbar Background Helper 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar Background Helper

Sets the taskbar background for the transparent parts, always or only when there's a maximized window, designed to be used with Windows 11 Taskbar Styler.

Also, Windows 11 Taskbar Styler has a known limitation which makes some styles only work if there's a single monitor. This mod can be used as a workaround.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.2.3
entry.content:
• Fixed rotated badges (e.g. unread counters) for some programs.
  • Fixed the edge of the taskbar being non-clickable in some cases.
  • Fixed the taskbar not showing up at startup in some cases.
  • Fixed the tray icons flyout arrow being reversed when the taskbar is on the right.
  • Fixed taskbar overflow flyout opening on the left of the monitor when the taskbar is on the right.

entry.title: Taskbar Labels for Windows 11 1.3
entry.content:
• Added four modes, last two of which weren't possible before:
  • Show labels, don't combine taskbar buttons
  • Hide labels, combine taskbar buttons
  • Show labels, combine taskbar buttons
  • Hide labels, don't combine taskbar buttons
  • Added an option to show or hide labels for specific programs.
  • Improved custom indicator compatibility with adaptive width labels. Previously, it could break the layout or in rare cases cause a crash.
  • Fixed the "Minimum taskbar item width" option in newer Windows 11 versions.

entry.title: Click on empty taskbar space 1.4
entry.content:
• Fixed build errors introduced with latest version of Windhawk 1.5x

  • Use CoInitializeEx with COINIT_APARTMENTTHREADED (fixes issue #12: Can't Restart Explorer While this Mod is Enabled)

entry.title: Classic Menus 1.1.0
entry.content:
• This fixes third party applications which render their own menus with UXTheme data from incorrectly rendering or even crashing
  • This also makes the changes instantly apply without restarting programs

entry.title: Start button always on the left 1.1
entry.content:
• The start menu is now positioned on the left too. Can be disabled in the mod settings.
  • Added support for multiple monitors.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.2.2
entry.content:
• Fixed a possible crash loop on mod initialization with multiple monitors.
  • Fixed the taskbar becoming blank after changing the settings.
  • Fixed all taskbar items hidden in an overflow view after enabling the mod.
  • Improved handling of the right click menu on the top of the taskbar, reducing the chance of the menu being cut off.
